Detailed Description

This class represents the SHA256 wrapper-class.

You can use this class to easily create a sha256 hash. Just create an instance of sha256wrapper and call the inherited memberfunctions getHashFromString() and getHashFromFile() to create a hash based on a string or a file.

Have a look at the following example:

sha256wrapper implements resetContext(), updateContext() and hashIt() to create a hash.
